oracle.pg.hbase

Class SparkUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.pg.hbase.SparkUtils
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SparkUtilsBase

    public class SparkUtils
extends java.lang.Object
implements SparkUtilsBase
    This class implements SparkUtilsBase and it provides a set of convenient helper methods to facilitate running Apache Spark tasks against property graph data stored in Apache HBase.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getEdgeLabel(java.lang.Object graphElementReprOnDB)
      When the given graph element is a repsentation of an Edge, returns the edge label.
      java.lang.Long getElementId(java.lang.Object graphElementReprOnDB)
      This method returns a graph element (Vertex or Edge) ID.
      java.lang.Object getGraphElementReprOnDB(java.lang.Object dbObject)
      This method returns a graph element representation stored in one of the underlying databases.
      static SparkUtils getInstance()
      A helper method to return an instance of SparkUtils
      java.lang.Long getInVertexId(java.lang.Object graphElementReprOnDB)
      When the given graph element is a repsentation of an Edge, returns the in-vertex (or destination) ID.
      java.lang.Long getOutVertexId(java.lang.Object graphElementReprOnDB)
      When the given graph element is a repsentation of an Edge, returns the out-vertex (or source) ID.
      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getPropertyNames(java.lang.Object graphElementReprOnDB)
      This method returns a set of property names for a given graph element (Vertex or Edge).
      java.lang.Object getPropertyValue(java.lang.Object graphElementReprOnDB, java.lang.String keyName)
      This method returns the property value of a graph element for a given property key.
      boolean isElementForEdge(java.lang.Object graphElementReprOnDB)
      Returns true if the given graph element is a repsentation of an Edge.
      boolean isElementForVertex(java.lang.Object graphElementReprOnDB)
      Returns true if the given graph element is a repsentation of a Vertex.

      • getGraphElementReprOnDB

        public java.lang.Object getGraphElementReprOnDB(java.lang.Object dbObject)
        This method returns a graph element representation stored in one of the underlying databases. This representation is database specific and the return value should only be consumed by other APIs defined in this interface.
        Specified by:
        getGraphElementReprOnDB in interface SparkUtilsBase

      • getPropertyNames

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getPropertyNames(java.lang.Object graphElementReprOnDB)
        This method returns a set of property names for a given graph element (Vertex or Edge). A NULL value will be returned if there is no properties (K/V pairs) in the given graph element.
